name: HRForcast

enhanced_description: HRForecast is an HR tech company providing robust SaaS people analytics solutions and consulting services. They offer AI-enabled HR solutions, including people analytics, strategic workforce planning, talent marketplace, and market intelligence, to address critical HR questions. The company has developed a new approach to Human Resources Management, leveraging over 10 years of experience with state-of-the-art technologies like big data and AI.
competitive_advantages: Utilizes state-of-the-art technologies including big data and AI
Provides individual instances for maximum client security and data protection
Offers robust and scalable software solutions
A completely new approach to Human Resources Management
roi_benefits: Better decision-making in HR through data-driven insights
